description: EventLogSourcesView is a simple tool that displays the list of all event log sources installed on your system. For every event log source, the following information is displayed: Event Source Name, Event Type, DLL/EXE Files containing the event message strings, Registry Modified Time, and version information taken from the DLL/EXE file (Product Name, Company, File Description, File Version)
shortcuts: NirSoft\EventLogSourcesView - Shows installed event log sources
